reviewText:
I reviewed Part 2.  Same for part 1.

Tom and Jerry are more friends compared to the original when they more enemies. That is not to say they don't beat up on each other. More Spike and Tyke in these than the original.

I reviewed Part 1.  Same for Part 2

Tom and Jerry are more friends compared to the original when they more enemies.  That is not to say they don't beat up on each other.  More Spike and Tyke in these than the original.
Every Tom & Jerry DVD gives my grandson and me hours of delight!

This 2 Disc DVD set contains 13 episodes from Season 1 of the Tom & Jerry Show Cartoon. This is DVD release 2 of 2 of the first season episodes. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD set: 1. Turn About / The Plight Before Christmas 2. Tuffy Love / Poof! 3. Top Cat / Mummy Dearest 4. Domestic Kingdom / Molecular Breakup 5. Just Plane Nuts / Pets Not Welcome 6. Cruisin' For A Bruisin' / Road Trippin' 7. Magic Mirror / Bone Dry 8. My Bot-Y Guard / Little Quacker and Mister Fuzzy Hide 9. Pipeline / No Brain, No Gain 10. Cat Napped / Black Cat 11. Hunger Strikes / Gravi-Tom 12. Ghost Party / Cat-Astrophe 13. Curse Case Scenario / Say Cheese You can find Season 1 Part 1 at the following Link: The Tom and Jerry Show: Season 1 Part 1

This 2 Disc DVD set contains 13 episodes from Season 1 of the Tom & Jerry Show Cartoon. This is DVD release 1 of 2 of the first season episodes. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD set: 1. Spike Gets Skooled / Cats-Ruffled Furniture 2. Sleep Disorder / Tom's In-Tents Adventure 3. Birthday Bashed / Feline Fatale 4. Cat Nippy / Ghost of a Chance 5. Holed Up / One of a Kind 6. Belly Achin'/ Dog Daze 7. Birds of a Feather / Vampire Mouse 8. Entering and Breaking / Franken Kitty 9. Tom-Foolery / Haunted Mouse 10. Here's Looking A-Choo Kid! / Superfied 11. What A Pain / Hop To It! 12. For The Love of Ruggles / Sleuth or Consequences 13. Dinner Is Swerved / Bottled Up Emotions You can find Season 1 Part 2 at the following Link: The Tom and Jerry Show: Season 1 Part 2
